text: 19.23: Mt 27.35; Mk 15.24; Ru 23.34Mben gɨɨtɨvi, Zisas ndi khanarareŋ ga ntorgap, ana shagi, mbe nta ndigap, nta shɨgap fethɨgi phogi ga suegi. Mba gɨɨtɨvi, mbe zam bueŋbueŋra ndigi. Mbe vhɨra ana fhava sharige ndigi. Mba gɨɨtɨvi ana ndigap garav, mbe shagi fɨgi vhɨrve ndigap, wari tɨgap mba fhava shaage samgi fhuvara. Mbe shaa bavira ana muuŋgiap, ana samgi fhuvara.
